not-applicable.name: Not Applicable
not-applicable.desc: Cannot create a half-breed with this race! Dragons limit reproduction to their own kind. They have experimented allowing Humans to use their blood to create the Ue'drahc, but this genesis is not utilized presently.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.desc: No. This race contains too many arcane and whimsical properties.

fae.name: Fae
fae.desc: No. Not interested in races with heavy magical influence.

human.name: Human
human.desc: Yes. Dwarves can tolerate this race.

kerasoka.name: Kerasoka
kerasoka.desc: Yes. Ever since the Kerasoka lost magic, it hasn't been a problem.

lumeacia.name: Lumeacia
lumeacia.desc: No. Not interested in races with heavy magical influence.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.desc: Yes. Dwarves can tolerate this race.

uedrahc.name: Ue'drahc
uedrahc.desc: No. Reptilian Humans are imposing, tall, and scaly.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.desc: No. Dwarves haven't made an alliance acceptable.

fae.name: Fae
fae.desc: Yes. The Fae is welcomed because of enchanted bloodlines.

human.name: Human
human.desc: Yes. While not overly exciting for the Elemental, there's nothing wrong with a Human friend.

kerasoka.name: Kerasoka
kerasoka.desc: Yes. Although most wish the Kerasoka possessed magic, they have established liaisons.

lumeacia.name: Lumeacia
lumeacia.desc: Yes. The Lumeacia is welcomed because of enchanted bloodlines.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.desc: Yes. Shapeshifters have abilities to transform into beings that make situations easier.

uedrahc.name: Ue'drahc
uedrahc.desc: No. Though there are no ill feelings, the partnership is not considered.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.desc: No. Dwarves haven't made an alliance acceptable.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.desc: Yes. Ties between the two can create exceptionally talented beings.

human.name: Human
human.desc: Yes. A Human is almost like a wingless Fae in the end.

kerasoka.name: Kerasoka
kerasoka.desc: Yes. This elven race shares habitat with the Fae, so bonds are common.

lumeacia.name: Lumeacia
lumeacia.desc: No. There is tension due to the Kerasoka alliance.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.desc: Yes. The Fae have no historical problems with Shapeshifters.

uedrahc.name: Ue'drahc
uedrahc.desc: No. Though there are no ill feelings, the partnership is not considered.

not-applicable.name: Not Applicable
not-applicable.desc: Cannot create a half-breed with this race! A being is either dead or not-dead; there is no in-between. Ghosts derive from the passing of select races: Lumeacia, Kerasoka, Shapeshifter, Dwarf, or Human.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.desc: Yes. Humans are accepting and open to all types of exchanges.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.desc: Yes. Humans are accepting and open to all types of exchanges.

fae.name: Fae
fae.desc: Yes. Humans are accepting and open to all types of exchanges.

kerasoka.name: Kerasoka
kerasoka.desc: Yes. Humans are accepting and open to all types of exchanges.

lumeacia.name: Lumeacia
lumeacia.desc: No. These elves see no benefit to coalescing with Humans.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.desc: Yes. This race is similar to Humans, but with bonus abilities.

uedrahc.name: Ue'drahc
uedrahc.desc: Yes. Offspring are more Dragon-like, therefore keeping the Ue'drahc community strong.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.desc: Yes. Dwarves are on the gruff side, but do form stable and healthy affairs.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.desc: Yes. Few Kerasoka are keen to regain magic and this might help.

fae.name: Fae
fae.desc: Yes. The Fae shares habitat with this elven race, so bonds are common.

human.name: Human
human.desc: Yes. The pair is close in their composition and are agreeable.

lumeacia.name: Lumeacia
lumeacia.desc: Yes. Viewed as forbidden because of past events, but it does happen.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.desc: Yes. The pair is close in their composition and are agreeable.

uedrahc.name: Ue'drahc
uedrahc.desc: No. Though there are no ill feelings, the partnership is not considered.

not-applicable.name: Not Applicable
not-applicable.desc: Cannot create a half-breed with this race! Folk who are bitten and turned by the Korcai virus are completely altered. Once transformed, the infected lose any capabilities and appearances of their former race.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.desc: No. The feeling of dislike is mutual between the two.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.desc: Yes. The Lumeacia are positive when it relates to enhancing magical and intellectual knowledge.

fae.name: Fae
fae.desc: No. There is tension due to the Kerasoka alliance.

human.name: Human
human.desc: No. There is no curiosity or passion with races that may struggle with magic.

kerasoka.name: Kerasoka
kerasoka.desc: Yes. Viewed as forbidden because of past events, but it does happen.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.desc: No. There is no curiosity or passion with races that may struggle with magic.

uedrahc.name: Ue'drahc
uedrahc.desc: No. They do not detest Ue'drahc, but the product of their union could be an abomination.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.desc: Yes. Shapeshifters are accepting and open to all types of exchanges.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.desc: Yes. Shapeshifters are accepting and open to all types of exchanges.

fae.name: Fae
fae.desc: Yes. Shapeshifters are accepting and open to all types of exchanges.

human.name: Human
human.desc: Yes. The roots of Shapeshifters orginated with Humans.

kerasoka.name: Kerasoka
kerasoka.desc: Yes. The pair is close in their composition and are agreeable.

lumeacia.name: Lumeacia
lumeacia.desc: No. Largely because of Lumeacia opinion, these elves are avoided.

uedrahc.desc: No. Though there are no ill feelings, the partnership is not considered.

elemental.desc: No. Though there are no ill feelings, the partnership is not considered.
